languages.text: "Примерно двенадцать лет назад на Денза было совершено покушение. Немногие смогли бы даже подобраться к нему, не то что ранить, но тот убийца действовал — вернее, действовала — мастерски. Денза спасла его живучесть и надежные импланты, но медикам пришлось почти что собирать его заново".

"About twelve years back, there was an attempt on Denz's life. Not many could have even got close to him, let alone wounded him, but that assassin was a master of her craft. Denz always was a hardy fellow, and that's what saved him. That and his trusty implants. But the medics pretty much had to put him back together from scratch."
languages.original_text: "Примерно двенадцать лет назад на Денза было совершено покушение. Немногие смогли бы даже подобраться к нему, не то что ранить, но тот убийца действовал — вернее, действовала — мастерски. Денза спасла его живучесть и надежные импланты, но медикам пришлось почти что собирать его заново".

traits.locale_text: "About twenty years back, there was an attempt on Denz's life. Few could have even come close to him, let alone wound him, but that assassin was a master of her craft. What saved Denz was his hardiness and solid implants, but the medics pretty much had to put him back together from scratch."

"About twenty years back, there was an attempt on Denz's life. Few could have even come close to him, let alone wound him, but that assassin was a master of her craft. What saved Denz was his hardiness and solid implants, but the medics pretty much had to put him back together from scratch."

"About twenty years back, there was an attempt on Denz's life. Not many could have even got close to him, let alone wounded him, but that assassin was a master of her craft. Denz always was a hardy fellow, and that's what saved him. That and his trusty implants. But the medics pretty much had to put him back together from scratch."

Denz always was a hardy fellow, and that's what saved him. That and his trusty implants. But the medics pretty much had to put him back together from scratch."

"About twelve years back, there was an attempt on Denz's life. Not many could have even got close to him, let alone wounded him, but that assassin was a master of her craft. Denz always was a hardy fellow, and that's what saved him. That and his trusty implants. But the medics pretty much had to put him back together from scratch."

"About twelve years back, there was an attempt on Denz's life. Not many could have even got close to him, let alone wounded him, but that assassin was a master of her craft. Denz always was a hardy fellow, and that's what saved him. That and his trusty implants. But the medics pretty much had to put him back together from scratch."

languages.text: “大约十二年前，有人打算刺杀丹兹。能接近丹兹的人屈指可数，更别提打算要他的命了，但那个刺客的技艺非常精湛。丹兹一直都是个顽强的家伙，他当时也是靠这股顽强劲儿才挺了过来。当然，还有他可靠的植入物。不过即便如此，医护人员还是花了很大力气，才把七零八落的他重新拼凑起来。”
languages.original_text: "About twelve years back, there was an attempt on Denz's life. Not many could have even got close to him, let alone wounded him, but that assassin was a master of her craft. Denz always was a hardy fellow, and that's what saved him. That and his trusty implants. But the medics pretty much had to put him back together from scratch."

traits.locale_text: “大约十二年前，有人打算刺杀丹兹。能接近丹兹的人屈指可数，更别提打算要他的命了，但那个刺客的技艺非常精湛。丹兹一直都是个顽强的家伙，他当时也是靠这股顽强劲儿才挺了过来。当然，还有他可靠的植入物。不过即便如此，医护人员还是花了很大力气，才把七零八落的他重新拼凑起来。”

languages.text: «Hace unos doce años, intentaron asesinar a Denz. No muchos podían acercarse a él, y mucho menos herirle, pero esa asesina era una auténtica experta. Denz siempre ha sido duro, y eso fue lo que le salvó. Bueno, eso y sus implantes, pero los médicos casi tuvieron que reconstruirle de cero».
languages.original_text: "About twelve years back, there was an attempt on Denz's life. Not many could have even got close to him, let alone wounded him, but that assassin was a master of her craft. Denz always was a hardy fellow, and that's what saved him. That and his trusty implants. But the medics pretty much had to put him back together from scratch."

traits.locale_text: «Hace unos doce años, intentaron asesinar a Denz. No muchos podían acercarse a él, y mucho menos herirle, pero esa asesina era una auténtica experta. Denz siempre ha sido duro, y eso fue lo que le salvó. Bueno, eso y sus implantes, pero los médicos casi tuvieron que reconstruirle de cero».

languages.text: 「12年ほど前、デンツの命が狙われたことがありました。彼を負傷させることはおろか、近づくことさえできた者はそう多くはありませんでしたが、あのアサシンはまさに殺しの達人でした。デンツは昔から頑強だったおかげで命を救われました。あと、彼の信頼できるインプラントも役に立ちましたね。それでも衛生兵たちは、彼をほとんど一から組み立てなおす必要がありました」
languages.original_text: "About twelve years back, there was an attempt on Denz's life. Not many could have even got close to him, let alone wounded him, but that assassin was a master of her craft. Denz always was a hardy fellow, and that's what saved him. That and his trusty implants. But the medics pretty much had to put him back together from scratch."

traits.locale_text: 「12年ほど前、デンツの命が狙われたことがありました。彼を負傷させることはおろか、近づくことさえできた者はそう多くはありませんでしたが、あのアサシンはまさに殺しの達人でした。デンツは昔から頑強だったおかげで命を救われました。あと、彼の信頼できるインプラントも役に立ちましたね。それでも衛生兵たちは、彼をほとんど一から組み立てなおす必要がありました」

languages.text: "Vor ungefähr zwölf Jahren gab es einen Mordanschlag auf Denz. Nicht viele konnten an ihn heran, geschweige denn, ihn verwunden, aber diese Assassinin war eine Meisterin ihrer Kunst. Denz war schon immer ziemlich zäh, und das hat ihn gerettet. Das und seine treuen Implantate. Aber die Ärzte mussten ihn im Prinzip von Grund auf neu zusammensetzen."
languages.original_text: "About twelve years back, there was an attempt on Denz's life. Not many could have even got close to him, let alone wounded him, but that assassin was a master of her craft. Denz always was a hardy fellow, and that's what saved him. That and his trusty implants. But the medics pretty much had to put him back together from scratch."

traits.locale_text: "Vor ungefähr zwölf Jahren gab es einen Mordanschlag auf Denz. Nicht viele konnten an ihn heran, geschweige denn, ihn verwunden, aber diese Assassinin war eine Meisterin ihrer Kunst. Denz war schon immer ziemlich zäh, und das hat ihn gerettet. Das und seine treuen Implantate. Aber die Ärzte mussten ihn im Prinzip von Grund auf neu zusammensetzen."

languages.text: « Il y a une douzaine d'années, quelqu'un a attenté à la vie de Denz. Rares sont les assassins qui pouvaient l'approcher, et encore plus rares ceux qui parvenaient à le blesser, mais celle-là était particulièrement douée. Heureusement, Denz a toujours été solide comme un roc et c'est ce qui l'a sauvé ce jour-là. Ça et ses implants. Enfin, les médecins ont grosso modo dû le réassembler de zéro. »
languages.original_text: "About twelve years back, there was an attempt on Denz's life. Not many could have even got close to him, let alone wounded him, but that assassin was a master of her craft. Denz always was a hardy fellow, and that's what saved him. That and his trusty implants. But the medics pretty much had to put him back together from scratch."

traits.locale_text: « Il y a une douzaine d'années, quelqu'un a attenté à la vie de Denz. Rares sont les assassins qui pouvaient l'approcher, et encore plus rares ceux qui parvenaient à le blesser, mais celle-là était particulièrement douée. Heureusement, Denz a toujours été solide comme un roc et c'est ce qui l'a sauvé ce jour-là. Ça et ses implants. Enfin, les médecins ont grosso modo dû le réassembler de zéro. »

languages.text: "Yaklaşık on iki yıl önce biri Denz'in canına kast etmişti. Onu yaralamak bir yana, insanlar ona yaklaşamazdı bile. Fakat bu suikastçı, işinde ustaydı. Denz, ezelden beri dirençli biri olduğundan canını kurtardı. Bir de sadık implantları sayesinde tabii. Yine de sıhhiyeciler onu hayata döndürürken neredeyse baştan yarattılar."
languages.original_text: "About twelve years back, there was an attempt on Denz's life. Not many could have even got close to him, let alone wounded him, but that assassin was a master of her craft. Denz always was a hardy fellow, and that's what saved him. That and his trusty implants. But the medics pretty much had to put him back together from scratch."

traits.locale_text: "Yaklaşık on iki yıl önce biri Denz'in canına kast etmişti. Pek fazla kişi onu yaralamak bir yana, ona yaklaşamazdı bile. Fakat bu suikastçı işinde ustaydı. Denz ezelden beri mukavim biri olduğundan canını kurtardı. Bir de sadık implantları sayesinde tabii. Sıhhiyeciler onu hayata döndürürken neredeyse baştan yarattılar."
